#summary Windows time format (time stamp)
#labels Featured

= Description =

 Windows time is stored in FILETIME structure:
{{{typedef struct _FILETIME {
  DWORD dwLowDateTime;
  DWORD dwHighDateTime;
} FILETIME; 
}}}
